After months of dedicated work, my co-authors Antony William Joseph, Virpi Roto, and I are thrilled to announce that our conference paper, "Human-Centred Design for an Uncertain Future," was presented by Antony last September at the HWID2024 conference, held at the Department of Computer Science, University of Milan, Italy.

Earlier this summer, in July, we also published another paper, "Participatory Design Approach to Sustainable Voyage Planning â€“ Case Maritime Autonomous Surface Ships". This work enabled us to identify key opportunities for enhancing the sustainability of maritime voyages.

Most of the research work was done last year. I had the incredible opportunity to work as a UX Researcher on autonomous ship development, using human-centered design methods. This experience highlighted important issues related to designing for future users in a rapidly advancing world with AI systems. You can see me hosting our developed workshop in one of the photos. ðŸ˜Š
